themes.name: Music
conversation_prompts: What was your favorite song when you were young?
Did you ever dance to this kind of music?
What music did your family listen to together?

themes.name: Pets
conversation_prompts: Tell me about pets you've had
What was your favorite animal growing up?
Did you have a special pet story?

themes.name: Seasons
conversation_prompts: What's your favorite season?
What did you do in spring/summer/fall/winter?
What seasonal activities did you enjoy?

themes.name: Holidays
conversation_prompts: What holidays were special in your family?
Tell me about holiday traditions
What holiday foods did you enjoy?

themes.name: Food
conversation_prompts: What was your favorite food growing up?
Did you enjoy cooking?
What foods remind you of home?

themes.name: School
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your school days
What was your favorite subject?
Did you have a favorite teacher?

themes.name: Clothing
conversation_prompts: What did you like to wear?
Do you remember fashion trends?
Did you have a special outfit?

themes.name: Weather
conversation_prompts: What kind of weather do you enjoy?
Do you remember any special weather days?
What did you do on rainy/sunny days?

themes.name: Flowers
conversation_prompts: Did you have a garden?
What are your favorite flowers?
Do you remember picking flowers?

themes.name: Colors
conversation_prompts: What's your favorite color?
What colors do you remember from your home?
Did you have colorful clothes or decorations?

themes.name: Games
conversation_prompts: What games did you play as a child?
Did you play card games or board games?
What was your favorite way to have fun?

themes.name: Movies
conversation_prompts: What movies did you enjoy?
Did you go to the movie theater?
Who were your favorite movie stars?

themes.name: Books
conversation_prompts: Did you enjoy reading?
What were your favorite books?
Did anyone read to you as a child?

themes.name: Family
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your family
What family traditions did you have?
What did you do together as a family?

themes.name: Neighbors
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your neighborhood
Did you have good neighbors?
What was your community like?

themes.name: Birthday
conversation_prompts: How did you celebrate birthdays?
What was your favorite birthday memory?
What kind of birthday cake did you like?

themes.name: Travel
conversation_prompts: Where did you like to travel?
What places did you visit?
Tell me about a special trip

themes.name: Dancing
conversation_prompts: Did you enjoy dancing?
What dances did you know?
Where did you go dancing?

themes.name: Friends
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your friends
What did you do with friends?
Do you have a special friendship memory?

themes.name: Childhood
conversation_prompts: What do you remember from being little?
What was your childhood home like?
What did you enjoy doing as a child?
